name: Sunnyside
description: A perfectly soft cashmere baby sweater knit from the top down in one piece. Two options are included: delicate lace for the discerning baby; more rugged cables for the outdoorsy-go getter
suggested_yarn: Tanis Fiber Arts Purple Label Cashmere Sock
full_text: A perfectly soft cashmere baby sweater knit from the top down in one piece. Two options are included: delicate lace for the discerning baby; more rugged cables for the outdoorsy-go getter The smaller sizes make a great single skein project for that special ball of fingering weight yarn! For more information see: http://www.tanisfiberarts.com/blog/2011/04/sunnyside-baby...
